name: Contemporary Modern Duplex - Thonglor
description: Great location, perfectly equipped, contemporary furniture, airy duplex in Bangkok's coolest neighborhood. Steps away from some of the best bars and restaurants this serene modern hideaway is perfect for both relaxation and business.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is safe and very hip. You can walk to some of Bangkok's best bars and restaurants. Nevertheless the apartment is quiet.
host_about:
I love to travel and I love to work. I'm a writer and filmmaker with a passion for design. I can help you navigate the city of Bangkok which I know very well: the best fresh fruit juice, a bespoke tailor, the massage parlor that lets you forget how you got here, the open mic gallery, best haircuts. 
I called Bangkok home for more than 7 years, speak the language, and have traveled the whole country extensively. So keep those questions coming.

This 25 sq.m studio is situated on the 23rd floor with a majestic view over the river & the city of Bangkok. Private balcony.

host_about:
Welcome to the enchanting Bangkok or KrungThep – as it is called in Thai, home to pristine natural beauty, eternal sunshine, dramatic mountains, breathtaking sparkling blue sea, exotic underwater treasures, and world famous hot and spicy cuisines.
My Homeliday Bangkok welcomes you with the comforts of a home away from home, at a cost effective alternative to a hotel stay, for your short to long stay needs.
We are a Thai-European managed company offering you brand-new fully furnished apartments, hosted in complexs serenely located just a troll away from the busy major shopping malls and Suvarnabhumi Airport, easily accessible by all kinds of public transport.
My Homeliday Bangkok is your perfect accommodation for your dream holidays in the city of Bangkok.

description:
My cosy 2 bedrooms apartment can host up to 4 adults.
You will find all the facilities and equipment needed for a perfect stay with the rooftop, the 5* hotel style pool and the short distance to the city center.
neighborhood_overview: The appartment is right on Sukhumvit road in the center of Bangkok, between Sukhumvit 69 and Sukhumvit 71 which will make it easy for any taxi to drop you off as well as quick to get around to all major nightlife and shopping areas. For those who like the explore the more local side of Bangkok, the back streets behind the condominium have many street food places  and a fresh market to explore "real local Thai food". A 24hrs convenient shop is within 50 meters of the condominium.

Passionated about wine, good food and his home town football team.

name: Cozy, Free Wi-Fi&CableTV near MRT!
description:
Cozy modern styled, the brilliant one bedroom apartment with pool view.

*Special Offers & Promotions. Save 5 - 35% waiting for you inside...
Hot Price! STAY 14 NIGHTS, GET 5%TOP UP DISCOUNT.
neighborhood_overview:
SEE Airbnb neighborhood : https://www.airbnb.com/locations/bangkok/din-daeng-huai-khwang

On the Sutthisan Street, guests can enjoy many local street foods (Padthai, meat BBQ, Somtam etc.) and also the 24 hour mini mart (7-11, Tesco Lotus). Asian restaurants nearby (Korea, Veitnam, China etc.)located approx 500 meters from apartment and a friendly pub & restuarant on the alley(Soi Rungrueng). But if you're a Coffee addict, Boncafe Vino(at the ground floor of Muang Thai-Phatra Tower) is a nice bistro to visit.

**Sutthisan MRT station (exit 2) is the best access to MRT station(7 minute-walk). As well as the Sutthisan MRT station (exit 3), you can walk along Weekday Shopping area and enjoy a variety of goods (clothes, foods, toys, shoes, lady accesseries etc.) in reasonable price
The bus stop located nearby the Sutthisan MRT exit 2 and there are many public buses which you can ride to many parts of Bangkok.
host_about:
Hey guys!
I'm Chalinee, working in field of Architecture, Urban Design and City Planning. I had been to Japan several times for training and love to travel abroad on my own, so please assured that my place will be a good choice to facilitate for the traveler's need.
I have enjoyed hosting as it gives me the chance to meet people from around the world. From my leaser experience, I have found that visitors really appreciate the location and cozy feeling of the apartment.

If you are moving to Bangkok or just here for a while, I'm glad to help with directions or suggestions.

Questions about the accommodation or myself, simply message me here.

Life is travelling. Your experience is an unique diary.
Bon Voyage, 
Chalinee
neighbourhood: Huai Khwang, Bangkok, Thailand

There is a supermarket (350m to Foodland) and a shopping center (700m to The Mall Ramkhamhaeng) nearby. The area is also close to Ramkhamhaeng University, Assumption University and the Rajamangala National Stadium.

name: Modern Bangkok townhouse
description: Our house is a beautifully renovated townhouse located in the popular Thonglor-Ekamai of Bangkok within walking distance of some of the city's best restaurants, in a safe compound with a pool. Airport pick transfers are included.
neighborhood_overview: Ekamai-Thonglor is Bangkok's best neighbourhoods with a wide selection of great restaurants, bars and night clubs. It is where expats and well healed Bangkokians live and play and the area is great for exploring and discovering cool and interesting local hang-outs. There are also plenty of local shops in the area ranging from convenience stores to high-class boutiques and local markets.
host_about: We are a family that has been living and working in Thailand for 23 years. I own and run a well known travel company and spend a lot of time travelling in Asia and Europe. The house we rent is our own home and we spend most summers in the UK, which is where I am from. We have been lovingly renovating our Bangkok townhouse for many years and have created a space we are very proud of and are happy to share with guests. With convenient location, all the modern comforts you could possibly need plus full-time star at your disposal,  we believe we can offer a more genuine five-star Bangkok experience than a hotel.
neighbourhood: Prakanong , Bangkok, Thailand

name: Sunny  Corner 2 bedroom apartment
description: The Amethyst 39 on Sukhumvit Soi 39 sits in the heart of hip Bangkok, around 15 to 20mins walk or free tuktuk to Phrom Phong BTS and Enporium Shopping Centre. Right next to the famous hospital, Samitivej Sukhumvit Hospital .High speed wifi available
neighborhood_overview:
The building itself is well-equipped with modern amenities including a swimming pool, Jacuzzi, gym and 24 hour security. A nice feature is the building's tuk-tuk service which drives residents and guests to the end of the street by the Phrom Phong BTS station, Bangkok's terrific elevated subway system which will quickly whisk you away to destinations throughout Bangkok. For those with a car, there's a free parking garage under the building.

I am looking after these two apartments in Bangkok with the help of my local house carer.

I have worked and lived in various parts of Australia, Hong Kong, Canada. I love traveling, love to experience the local culture, local food and to meet local mates.

The best way to experience the destination in a short trip is to stay at a local's place. Thereby, as a travel-fanatic like myself, I would like to offer you our apartment for your adventure.

name: 1 Bedroom near BTS Ari (Cozy, Relaxed Style)
description: The room is on 6th floor with nice view. There are bedroom with BIG bed and living room with kitchen. The building is in Boutique style and suitable for travelers who love Arts and would like to stay in a residential area in central Bangkok.
host_about:
Sawasdee krub! I would like you to know 5 things about me!

(1) I am a native Thai who has lived in the UK and France and joined cultural exchange programs in over 35 countries! 
(2) I am a musician and singer who wrote and sing a song for Tourism Authority of Thailand. Search for 'Miracle Thailand' song on YouTube. 
(3) I am hosting my own travel program on YouTube called 'Hey! Asean' to introduce to you places to visit, great activities, and good food from Thailand and Southeast Asia.
(4) I worked at a company known for 'The Best Place to Work For', but decided to leave to start my own business to promote Tourism & Culture of Southeast Asia.
(5) I love to stay in Arts Hotel and visit Arts City e.g. Prague, Salzburg, Kyoto, San Francisco, Luang Prabang, Bagan and many more :)

name: Pratunam 2BR condo in Ratchaprarop
description:
58sqm private and clean 2BR apartment. 20 mins train ride from Survanarbhumi Airport.
The condo is just 2 minutes walk from Airport Link Ratchaprarop station,located on the street of Pratunam area,near Central World and Platinum.
neighborhood_overview:
If you love shopping, you are into the right location. Surroundings are the popular Pratunam Wholesale Market, night markets along Pratunam, Platinum Mall, Palladium and Central World.
Closest Super Market is Big C, 5 mins by walk, which is opposite Central World. The famous 4 faced Buddha, at Ratchaprasong Junction is just 5-7mins away by walk. Siam Square and MBK are a mere 5mins cab ride away. The latest addition Neon Night Bazaar is just less than 10 mins walk.

-There will be a security deposit of 4000baht required for electricity and water bills, and balance will be refunded after deduction.
host_about: I loves travelling so will be in and out of the country often, usually in  SEA region. Travelling helps set my mind at ease and appreciates everything and everyone around me better.

name: Onnut BTS Station 2 Br 2 beds wifi
description: BTS Onnut is right in front of the Building which can take you into the heart of town and shopping district within 15 minutes; or if you’re coming from the Suvarnabhumi airport, the taxi only takes about 25 mins.
neighborhood_overview:
It's super Convenient !!
It is just a minute walk to BTS sky train station
7-11 is next door on the left. On the right is Century the movie Plaza with so many restaurants, Starbuck, stores and Tops supermarket.
Tesco Supermarket, food court and restaurants are just across the street (Sukhumvit soi 50). Bic C Supermarket, True coffee and convenient store near by.• On Nut is a bustling non-touristy area popular with younger Bangkok office-workers. It has an abundance of street food, market stalls & excellent public transport.

• Centrally located in Bangkok, only 5-15 min by BTS to lower Sukhumvit and Siam shopping & entertainment areas.

• Next door is Century Complex which have everything you would looking for: supermarket, electric store, McDonald, Starbuck, tea place, restaurants, Cinema,

• Just around the corner is Soi 77/1 alley, full of excellent 150B/hour (!) foot/thai massage shops and street food & snack stalls.

• For

description: Welcome to our 2BDR Bangkok apartment. If you and your friends and family are looking for a cozy place to stay while experiencing real Bangkok, this is the place to be. Walking distance to Metro, Shopping District (Emporium)and Thonglor; coolest Bangkok lifestyle street. The apartment also has amazing city view.
neighborhood_overview: This location is the best to experience Bangkok has to offer. Very closed to Emporium Department store and Emquartier Shopping center. Only one stop to Terminal21 , 4 stops to Central World, Siam Paragon and MBK center. If you want to experience Bangkok like locals, Thonglor Street is only 5 minutes walk from the apartment. You will find the best fine dining, bars and hip restaurants in town. Also, famous bangkok street foods is a must try.

name: [LF_4] PRIVATE ELITE 3BEDS @ ARI BTS
description:
@@ FIND US Where the Rainbow Flag is! ;) @@

**AREE/ARI one of Bangkok's hippest neighborhood!
>> Hipster/Dog's Café, Street/Fusion Food, Karaoke, Fab shops and more! <<

- WALK; 5 mins to BTS Ari Station (N5)
- CAR; 10 mins to JJ Market ;20 Mins to PRATUNAM/SIAM/GRAND PALACE
- 30 mins to Airport
- This room is one of our 4 rooms in the Shared House.
- One private bathroom/Three shared bathrooms
- FREE BREAKFAST/WIFI/Smile: )
- Pets are welcome, please inform us in advance.
neighborhood_overview:
The house was built in the late 90's Colonial style with just few other houses in the village. Thanks to the Bangkok gentrification, the neighbor became a center of creativities and urban life styles with very convenient mass transportation; BTS Aree and Sanampao. You will find yourself surrounded by tall buildings with lights of Bangkok's life and bliss of innovative shops, stalls, cafes and restaurants. And since this area has been homes of many Thai noble families, you will find clusters of single detached homes with perfect garden and nice cars :) Listen carefully, you might hear someone playing piano for their leisure.

I have been living in this area for my whole life and never ever think of moving to any other places. You will love it as I do. There is everything you need within a walking distance plus alleys which can leads you to all the important destinations.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
host_about:
We are a group of enthusiastic hosts who enjoy meeting new people, plus exchange experiences from international guests.

We have been around collecting enhancing properties across Bangkok and some tourist destinations to showcase the charm and unique lifestyle of Thai people through how we live and also how YOU will live!

Who would know about Bangkok better than Bangkokian like us ;) 
We are very interested in hanging out with you. We do know where to go and what to do which you wouldn't find in any guide books. We met lots of awesome people and indeed many good friends from this society.

Even you will not be able to stay with us, you are still very welcome to chat about where and how to do things in Bangkok.
 
We hope you enjoy your stay with us and we will try our best to make sure that you have a wonderful time here, in the land of smiles, yummy food and amazing shopping experience.

Cheers! 
Nutt & PLERN /HIPAK CREWs

我们非常喜欢结识新的朋友，再加上交流经验的国际嘉宾的热情主机。
我们一直收集遍布整个曼谷和一些旅游地方的增强特性，以展示通过我们的生活方式的魅力和泰国人独特的生活方式，也是你将如何生活！没有谁比我们Bangkokian那么知道曼谷哪里好;）
我们很感兴趣跟你们去玩一玩。我们知道去哪里，做什么，你在导览册不会找到。我们遇到了很多真棒的人确实好多非常好的朋友，从这个社会。
即使你不能留在我们身边，我们仍然非常欢迎跟你们介绍因该去哪里干啥，还有怎么去那边。我们因该帮你找最好的方式。

我们希望您与我们享受您的住宿，我们将尽我们所能，以确保你在这里有一个美好的时光，在一颦一笑，美味的食品和美好购物的经验。

干杯！
Nutt & PLERN / HIPAK CREWs

name: [LF_3] PRIVATE GRAND 2BEDS @ ARI BTS
description:
@@ FIND US Where the Rainbow Flag is! ;) @@

**AREE/ARI one of Bangkok's hippest neighborhood!
>> Hipster/Dog's Café, Street/Fusion Food, Karaoke, Fab shops and more! <<

- WALK; 5 mins to BTS Ari Station (N5)
- CAR; 10 mins to JJ Market ;20 Mins to PRATUNAM/SIAM/GRAND PALACE
- 30 mins to Airport
- This room is one of our 4 rooms in the Shared House.
- One private bathroom/Three shared bathrooms
- FREE BREAKFAST/WIFI/Smile: )
- Pets are welcome, please inform us in advance.
neighborhood_overview:
The house was built in the late 90's Colonial style with just few other houses in the village. Thanks to the Bangkok gentrification, the neighbor became a center of creativities and urban life styles with very convenient mass transportation; BTS Aree and Sanampao. You will find yourself surrounded by tall buildings with lights of Bangkok's life and bliss of innovative shops, stalls, cafes and restaurants. And since this area has been homes of many Thai noble families, you will find clusters of single detached homes with perfect garden and nice cars :) Listen carefully, you might hear someone playing piano for their leisure.

I have been living in this area for my whole life and never ever think of moving to any other places. You will love it as I do. There is everything you need within a walking distance plus alleys which can lead you to all the important destinations.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
host_about:
We are a group of enthusiastic hosts who enjoy meeting new people, plus exchange experiences from international guests.

We have been around collecting enhancing properties across Bangkok and some tourist destinations to showcase the charm and unique lifestyle of Thai people through how we live and also how YOU will live!

Who would know about Bangkok better than Bangkokian like us ;) 
We are very interested in hanging out with you. We do know where to go and what to do which you wouldn't find in any guide books. We met lots of awesome people and indeed many good friends from this society.

Even you will not be able to stay with us, you are still very welcome to chat about where and how to do things in Bangkok.
 
We hope you enjoy your stay with us and we will try our best to make sure that you have a wonderful time here, in the land of smiles, yummy food and amazing shopping experience.

Cheers! 
Nutt & PLERN /HIPAK CREWs

我们非常喜欢结识新的朋友，再加上交流经验的国际嘉宾的热情主机。
我们一直收集遍布整个曼谷和一些旅游地方的增强特性，以展示通过我们的生活方式的魅力和泰国人独特的生活方式，也是你将如何生活！没有谁比我们Bangkokian那么知道曼谷哪里好;）
我们很感兴趣跟你们去玩一玩。我们知道去哪里，做什么，你在导览册不会找到。我们遇到了很多真棒的人确实好多非常好的朋友，从这个社会。
即使你不能留在我们身边，我们仍然非常欢迎跟你们介绍因该去哪里干啥，还有怎么去那边。我们因该帮你找最好的方式。

我们希望您与我们享受您的住宿，我们将尽我们所能，以确保你在这里有一个美好的时光，在一颦一笑，美味的食品和美好购物的经验。

干杯！
Nutt & PLERN / HIPAK CREWs

name: Cozy and huge 1BD Ekamai heart of Bangkok

neighborhood_overview:
Ekkamai area is the upper scale residential area, also the meeting ground of Bangkok's young urban and chic types.

Malls/Department Stores/ : Don Donki, Emporium, EmQuartier, Terminal 21 and Gateway, Big C/Index (1-3 bts station away)

Restaurants/nightlife are all walking distance or short 5 minute cab ride away.

Dining within walking distance: Al Majilis. J-Cafe, Zenn100baht Japanese, Manita, Zeist, Monkon Boutique & Bistro, Nikko Cafe, 6th Fratello, 24 Owls, Olive Greek & Mediterranan Cuisine, B Kool (soi 10), Hugo Bar & Eatery, Fabb Fashion Cafe Co, Coffe Beans by Dao, Vanilla Garden, White Session, Accidental Butcher, Melange, Perhaps Rabbit (soi 10), ChaCha An Japanese (soi 10), Ebisu Sushi (soi 10), Burger Factory (soi 10), Sabaijai Gai Yang, The Garret...and many more just in the next main street over in Thonglor district!

Nightlife/Clubs (walking distance): Funky Villa, Demo, Roof by MUSE, MUSE, Do Not Disturb (DND), Nunglen, Esobar,

host_about:
Hi, we are Neil and Yui. Welcome to our airbnb.
We are a young family living in Bangkok who have decided to try and host in our empty 1 bed room condo. 

About us. 
Im Neil,  originally from Scotland, I have been working and traveling world wide for about 10 years now, based in Bangkok for 6 of them and living in metro park for the last 2. I love to travel, meet new people and experience new things. I love the nights when my friends and I meet like minded travellers. We have shown some cool people the best bits of this city, the best bars/food that tourists never find and had some great nights out. I was basically a tourist here for 4 years and would love to pass my knowledge on and help make your trip unforgettable.

Yui my wife, Is a local city girl from here in west Bangkok. 

We look forward to meeting you on your adventure.

Neil & Yui

name: Chatuchak, 1 BR, 5min BTS/MRT, Surrounded by malls
description:
I stop hosting in airbnb for almost 2 years after I came back to Bangkok.
Now I'm away from home again so this place is available for anyone who interest to stay in the decent location in Bangkok with all well equipped facilities.
- 5 min to MRT/BTS
- surrounded by 3 big malls (3 min walking to find food/shopping)
- Sky pool with panoramic view
- Identity and luxury full furnished 1 BR 45sqm with full facilities
- Free wifi /Fitness/ Pool access
- 30 min from airport
- 24-hr security
neighborhood_overview:
- Many shopping malls and food court around the Condominium e.g. Central Plaza Ladprao, Tesco Lotus, Union mall (All places can be walked to by 5 minutes). Furthermore, you can experience the Thai local street food nearby in Ladprao Soi 1.

- The most famous market of Thailand, Chatuchak market (JJ) could be reached by MRT only 2 station or Taxi by 5 minutes.

- Recreational park area. e.g. Suan Rot Fai, Chatuchak park, Sirikit park can be walked to.

- 5 min walk to the BTS Ha Yaek Ladprao station and 10 min walk to MRT Phaholyothin station

- 15 min from Donmuang airport, 30 min from Suwannabhum airport

- Offices (Working area) e.g. Energy complex (Enco), Rasa tower, TMB tower, Sun tower, etc.

- Truly city view (new CBD) from the room
host_about:
Hi I'm Chanwith. I currently works in Oil & Gas business which make my life often far way from home. I love to live and learn any local cultures, foods and languages .

I heard the Airbnb first time by recommendation from my friend and  I got the great experience living in local neighborhood in Houston. When I came back to Thailand, I decided to start hosting with the unforgettable experience attitude as same as I was received in Airbnb.

I really ready to welcome all the travelers around the world who would like to get the real Thainess from the local Bangkokian as me. :)
neighbourhood: Next to Tesco lotus, Bangkok (Krung Thep Maha Nakhon ), Thailand

description:
The THAI NICE providing contemporary and luxurious accommodation at the heart of Bangkok's business district with easy transportation links.
The center of the shopping and entertainment district, THAI NICE offers spacious, well-furnished accommodations with kitchen facilities. It's features free Wi-Fi, free parking, an outdoor pool and fitness center.

Surrounded by various restaurants and a short stroll from popular nightlife, THAI NICE is downtown between Siam Paragon shoping mall (3 train stops) and Emporium shoping mall (1train stop), less than a 10-minute walk from Terminal 21 Shopping Mall and a 5-minute walk from Asoke and Nana BTS Skytrain Stations, and MRT stations or to the corner of Sukhumvit Road daily. name: Charming Family Villa by the Canal in Bangkok
description:
This villa is renovated from a 70 years old continental style house. We make use of old doors and window frames by putting it back in the newly renovated house. The wooden furniture in the house were made by local craftsmen. The villa has private dock that used to be the main entrance back to the time that Thai people travel by boats along the canal.

The place is close to MRT station 'Charan13'
neighborhood_overview:
Explore a typical suburban Thai community with narrow streets, cartwheel food stalls, and temples. Head to the sky train station to reach other parts of the city, or travel by boat along the Khlong Mon canal adjacent to the villa to the Chao Phraya River.
The authentic Thai flavor is also closed by at Talad Phlu market.
host_about:
I'm a professional photographer based in Bangkok.
I've lived in New York for 8 years.
I enjoy good food and watching movies on a sofa.
I've traveled the world a bit and remember how good it is to have a good sleep in foreign cities.
I want my guest to have that same feeling.

name: BaanTulsi 2 an authentic Thai teak house on Sathon
description: An authentic Thai teak house, 70 year old. Renovated and equipped with modern facilities, including wifi. Three bed rooms, total 8 beds. Locates in centre of Bangkok, Sathon Road, 10 minutes to BTS Surasak, 20 minutes from China Town and close by the express way to Suwannabhume Airport. Cosy atmosphere and family friendly with fresh markets nearby and various kinds of food of your choices.Very diverse community with Java Mosque, Catholic-Protestant church, Hindu-Buddhist temples.
neighborhood_overview:
Baan Tulsi Guest House is a cosy Thai-style accommodation with free WiFi in public areas. It suits for those who would like to enjoy real local atmosphere.
Simply furnished teak house, the rooms all come with hardwood floors and air conditioning or a fan. Guests have access to a shared bathroom equipped with shower facilities.
Refreshing drinks, coffee and snacks can be enjoyed. Guests can also relax in the seating area by the garden.
With just a short walk, guests can enjoy meals at the local restaurants serving Thai and Chinese food. Guests can also enjoy fresh market nearby with its reputation on fresh sea food, vegetable and ready to eat food.
The guest house is located conveniently 10 minutes from BTS Surasak, 15 minutes from Chao Phraya River where you can take speed boat and enjoy city cruising. Guests can also check out many of Bangkok’s old quarter of Bangrak, further down to China Town.
Suvarnabhumi International Airport is 35 km away.

7 minutes walk to BTS Chong nonsri station
5 minutes walk to Bangkok bank headquater

name: Mini Studio for 2-3 on Bangkok waterway
description: Navigate the captivating Venice of the East (Bangkok) in unusual ways (by fast river boats), beat the road traffic and rediscover the charm of the Thai Capital’s old-world canals and river network. My place is close to nightlife, public transport and both airports. You’ll love my place because of the ambiance (a mix of Venice, Hollywood + Paris Quartier Latin), the neighborhood, the people, the water ways and the light. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
neighborhood_overview: The complex has all amenities and many shops onsite. Outside the complex, you'll find many students areas with many restaurants and cafes. For fitness lovers, aside from the onsite pool and gym, the river banks are ideal for jogging. The area is also renown as the Hollywood of Bangkok with many filming studios and production houses nearby, and the inevitable classy and exciting nightlife it attracts all year round.
host_about: I am a former communication designer. Currently, I am flying around for business purposes. I love helping people discover my fascinating city, offering my place to fellow travelers, and making new friends from all around the world.

neighborhood_overview:
Born of Sansiri’s dream of transforming Sukhumvit 77 into a rich lifestyle hub,
T77 Community located on an over-50-rai plot of land in the centre of Sukhumvit 77,
the project and its surrounding area provide a complete array of lifestyle activities
and residential options.
T77 Community is close to both the BTS station and Ramindra – At Narong Expressway.
The development consists of 6 Sansiri condominiums – Blocs Sukhumvit 77, THE BASE Sukhumvit 77, THE BASE Park West,
THE BASE Park East, hasu HAUS and mori HAUS – and a townhouse project, Garden Square.
Habito is ready to cater to the needs of modern families and those looking for a contemporary lifestyle. There is always something new and interesting to discover at Habito, with a selection of more than 15 international restaurants, a host of premium services, and the new HUBBA-TO coworkingspace (the largest and best-equipped of its kind in Southeast Asia). In addition, Bangkok International Pr
host_about:
We are a group of enthusiastic hosts who enjoy meeting new people, plus exchange experiences from international guests.

We have been around collecting enhancing properties across Bangkok and some tourist destinations to showcase the charm and unique lifestyle of Thai people through how we live and also how YOU will live!

Who would know about Bangkok better than Bangkokian like us ;) 
We are very interested in hanging out with you. We do know where to go and what to do which you wouldn't find in any guide books. We met lots of awesome people and indeed many good friends from this society.

Even you will not be able to stay with us, you are still very welcome to chat about where and how to do things in Bangkok.
 
We hope you enjoy your stay with us and we will try our best to make sure that you have a wonderful time here, in the land of smiles, yummy food and amazing shopping experience.

Cheers! 
Nutt & PLERN /HIPAK CREWs

我们非常喜欢结识新的朋友，再加上交流经验的国际嘉宾的热情主机。
我们一直收集遍布整个曼谷和一些旅游地方的增强特性，以展示通过我们的生活方式的魅力和泰国人独特的生活方式，也是你将如何生活！没有谁比我们Bangkokian那么知道曼谷哪里好;）
我们很感兴趣跟你们去玩一玩。我们知道去哪里，做什么，你在导览册不会找到。我们遇到了很多真棒的人确实好多非常好的朋友，从这个社会。
即使你不能留在我们身边，我们仍然非常欢迎跟你们介绍因该去哪里干啥，还有怎么去那边。我们因该帮你找最好的方式。

我们希望您与我们享受您的住宿，我们将尽我们所能，以确保你在这里有一个美好的时光，在一颦一笑，美味的食品和美好购物的经验。

干杯！
Nutt & PLERN / HIPAK CREWs


+++++++ Here are our awesome listings  :) ++++++

 ------------------------ BANGKOK ------------------------

name: Riverside Apartment with Grand Palace View
description: Quiet and cosy corner apartment on 14th floor of a riverside building with an fantastic view of the Chao Phraya River from every room and the Grand Palace from the living room. Most of Bangkok's main attractions are only a stone's throw away, like the lively Khao San Road and the National Museum.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the Banglumphu neighbourhood. Also known as 'Old Bangkok', Banglamphu is a melting pot of millennial tourists and Thais living a simple way of life that seems to have disappeared in modern times.

Only a 15-minute walk away, the street market and party hotspot Khao San Road is Asia’s backpacking capital. Here you'll find countless street vendors, market stalls, restaurants, bars, clubs, massage parlours and much more. It's carefree vibe is what draws in visitors from all over the world.

While Khao San Road is undoubtedly the most famous part of the area, walking through the winding streets will lead you to Phra Athit Road is far more eclectic, with plenty of bohemian bars and local restaurants with a mix of young Thais and foreigners. The Phra Sumen Fort is also only a 5-minute walk from the apartment, located within a small park where you can watch the sunset over the river.

Banglamphu has an excellent number of street stal
host_about: I love to travel and see new places with my family. We have lived and travelled in different countries in Southeast Asia, Japan as well as in Europe. I was born and raised in Bangkok, so I want visitors to have great experiences, be comfortable and safe during their stay in my hometown. My husband and I speak fluent English. I am always willing to help!
neighbourhood: Bangkok, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand

name: Luxury Suite-King Studio2
description:
The THAI NICE welcome to providing contemporary and luxurious accommodation at the heart of Bangkok's business district

with easy transportation links. The center of the shopping and entertainment district, THAI NICE offers spacious,

well-furnished accommodations with kitchen facilities. It’s features free Wi-Fi, free parking, an outdoor pool and fitness center.
neighborhood_overview:
All guest rooms are air-conditioned and provide an SMART 40inch flat-screen TV, washing machine, microwave, vacuum cleaner , kettle , fridge and a working desk. An in-room safe is also available for added security. Complete with a shower, slippers and a hairdryer.

Surrounded by various restaurants and a short stroll from popular nightlife, THAI NICE is downtown between Siam Paragon shoping mall (3 train stops) and Emporium shoping mall (1train stop), less than a 10-minute walk from Terminal 21 Shopping Mall and a 5-minute walk from Asoke and Nana BTS Skytrain Stations, and MRT stations or to the corner of Sukhumvit Road daily. Suvarnabhumi International Airport is approximately a 35-minute drive away.

Also, there are some good local street foods ( roasted pork belly & bbq pork wt rice , hainanese chicken with rice, eastern food like papaya and spicy menu) to try on Chan 18/7 (St. Loius alley). You may take taxi there it would take only 5 mins

Nearest supermarket and food community mall is at Int-intersect on rama 3 road. It only takes 5 mins from our place. There are also good restaurants and dessert cafes outthere

Nearest 7/11 is right in front of chan 16 road, only 3 mins frm our place

name: Happy Cozy apartment in Heart of Bangkok
description: The Residence is Cozy and Privacy located at prime location of Sukhumvit and easiest access to Nana BTS station, and short walking distance to Asok BTS and Sukhumvit MRT stations. You can enjoy the most convenient connections to major business hubs, renowned local Pubs & Restaurants, local & International Schools, Hotels as well as direct routes to world renowned retail malls such as Terminal 21, The Emporium, Central Chidlom, expatriate and multi traveler around the area.
neighborhood_overview:
Located directly on Sukhumvit 13, Sukhumvit is unquestionably the most cosmopolitan area of the city. With the skytrain serving more than half its length, thus easing access to the various pleasures located on the main road and its adjoining streets, Sukhumvit is favoured by foreign residents as the place to live and play. It is also popular with well-to-do Thais who either live in modern condominiums or mansions set in huge compounds and enjoy the area's international flavour.
Essentially, Sukhumvit can be broken down into four distinctive entertainment areas: NaNa, Asok, Emporium and Thong Lor. Each has its own charms and attractions, and appeals to different groups of people.
*** In the walking distance to few malls along Sukhumvit Road i.e. Central Chidlom, Terminal 21 Asok, Ploenchit Centre: four-storey entertainment plaza near the mouth of Sukhumvit soi 4, and next to Sukhumvit soi 13 is Clinton Plaza, a former office block transformed into an entertainment centre.

name: Bangkokhaus
description:
217 Bangplat House - Stay Together is better. Rather than separate rooms in a traditional hotel. You can stay together with your group with a large common room and house space.

This cozy house was the popular designed right from the 70’s Mid Century Modern which widely popular constructed around the Bangkok Suburban area. Step away from tourist attractions and keep in touch with truly BANGKOKIAN LIFESTYLE!

Easily access both from a private car or Public Transit (Bus/Metro/Shuttle Boat/Grab).
neighborhood_overview:
The term Bang Phlat meaning 'lost place'. It is thought that, in the past, the area was filled with waterways and overgrown. People traveling from other areas lost their way. But nowadays, Bang Phlat takes a role as the most convenient living area in suburban Bangkok. You can reach most of the must-see tourist attractions such as Palace, Temple, Khao San Road, Floating Market or enjoy cruising along Chao-Phraya River like-a-local. This is also the perfect gateway to southern Thailand via Bus or Train.
You can find convenient stores such as Family Mart(150m) 7-11 (200m) or local coffee shop and Thai Food Store around.

name: Private Room
description:
Welcome to Siam Journey Guesthouse!
Located in a real Thai neighborhood with amazing street food and a unique atmosphere, Siam Journey hopes to show you a different side to Bangkok than the other more touristy areas in the city.
neighborhood_overview:
Although Siam Journey Guesthouse is in the center of Bangkok, the hostel hide it self in a quiet Muslim neighborhood. What's our guests love about the area is the local food street that is only 3 mins walk from our place.

While we stay in the bustling city centre, our street is well cut off from the noisy roads and you can be assured that you will be well rested at night. We have weekly activities that you can join in, such as our weekly games night, where our friends from all walk of lives and countries come in for a night of enjoyment.
host_about:
Welcome to Siam Journey Guesthouse! We are a small, community-orientated guesthouse based in an authentic Thai neighborhood near the heart of Bangkok. At the guesthouse are two 12-bed dormitories, as well as two 4-bed dormitories, for those of you looking for a communal atmosphere.  All our dorms come equipped with A/C, as well as clean linens, secured lockers, fresh towels and WiFi.  On the main floor you will find our large lounge, where you can come and relax, share stories or a drink, and have a great time with us and the other guests. 

Located in central Bangkok, our guesthouse is just a five minute walk from the Airport Rail Link and Phaya Thai BTS Skytrain stations. We are within walking distance to Siam Square, Victory Monument, neighborhood pubs and restaurants. Nearby is our local street market where you can find fresh fruit, food stall eats and the best roti in town. You will find whatever you need just steps away.

We coordinate weekly activities in and around Bangkok for the guests of Siam Journey to have a greater experience of our city. Looking for a great meal? Come with us as we explore Chinatown, Sukhumvit and Sao Ching Cha for the unique and unforgettable.  Want to spend the day shopping? Throughout the city are numerous markets, from the all-day weekend markets to the underground night markets. As well, there are muay thai fights, river boat rides, and glamorous rooftop lounges. Bangkok has it all, so let us show you what this great city has to offer. 

We are experienced hosts and travelers who can provide helpful advice, suggestions and directions throughout your stay with us, as well as help with various tour details should you choose to travel outside of Bangkok and onward to Thailand’s other provinces.
Come and join us as we journey through amazing and wondrous Siam! Sawat dee Krup!

host_about:
Welcome to airbnb world :) I am a Thai native . Born and raised in BKK.
I have always loved to travel, my first time on a plane was when a had just turned seven and ever since I fell in love with the world, I describe my self as a "citizen of the world" and as such we should not miss the opportunity to explore as many places as we can, but always keeping in mind this : " The most important thing when traveling is not the destination but our attitude and openness to live new experiences and perceive and respect all different cultures and beliefs ". We live in a world full of diversity and should respect it as is!! 
I love trekking and mountaineering, so I have had the experience to see my country as green as it !! .
I have been an Airbnb host and also a guest, having both experiences I make all my efforts so that those who choose to stay in one of my apartments will have a nice experience enjoy their stay the fullest and also their journey in Thailand,  which has many gastronomic places and cultural events all year round.

name: 2 Bedroom  BTS nana cozy place in heart of bangkok
description: The Residence is Cozy and Privacy located at prime location of Sukhumvit and easiest access to Nana BTS station, and short walking distance to Asok BTS and Sukhumvit MRT stations. You can enjoy the most convenient connections to major business hubs, renowned local Pubs & Restaurants, local & International Schools, Hotels as well as direct routes to world renowned retail malls such as Terminal 21, The Emporium, Central Chidlom, expatriate and multi traveler around the area.
neighborhood_overview:
Located directly on Sukhumvit 13, Sukhumvit is unquestionably the most cosmopolitan area of the city. With the skytrain serving more than half its length, thus easing access to the various pleasures located on the main road and its adjoining streets, Sukhumvit is favoured by foreign residents as the place to live and play. It is also popular with well-to-do Thais who either live in modern condominiums or mansions set in huge compounds and enjoy the area's international flavour.
Essentially, Sukhumvit can be broken down into four distinctive entertainment areas: NaNa, Asok, Emporium and Thong Lor. Each has its own charms and attractions, and appeals to different groups of people.
*** In the walking distance to few malls along Sukhumvit Road i.e. Central Chidlom, Terminal 21 Asok, Ploenchit Centre: four-storey entertainment plaza near the mouth of Sukhumvit soi 4, and next to Sukhumvit soi 13 is Clinton Plaza, a former office block transformed into an entertainment centre.

description: Nice and calm Condo near Sky train station and downtown Siam center , you will see many shopping center in siam square including the biggest splendid department store name Siam-Paragon and MBK , Siam center , Siam discovery center , Siam one , Central world , Platinum mall .
neighborhood_overview:
We got so many precious neighbor because we are on the best location of Bangkok .
Siam Discovery , Siam Center , Paragon , MBK , Siam One ,Line Village ,Central world , Gaysorn Plaza , Central Chidlom , Central Embassy , Platinum mall , Pratunum.
All of these place are connected with Sky walk .

The skywalk is an elevated footpath or walkway which has been built under the skytrain in the areas where many of the shopping malls are close together. The Skywalk means it is very easy to walk from MBK to Central Chidlom without having to step foot on the regular pavement / sidewalk.

The Bangkok Skywalk doesn't run the length of the Skytrain system but it is being extended gradually. The skywalk is clean, even and wide which allows for many people to walk between malls without getting jammed up or bumping into each other.

host_about:
Welcome to airbnb world :) I am a Thai native . Born and raised in BKK.
I have always loved to travel, my first time on a plane was when a had just turned seven and ever since I fell in love with the world, I describe my self as a "citizen of the world" and as such we should not miss the opportunity to explore as many places as we can, but always keeping in mind this : " The most important thing when traveling is not the destination but our attitude and openness to live new experiences and perceive and respect all different cultures and beliefs ". We live in a world full of diversity and should respect it as is!! 
I love trekking and mountaineering, so I have had the experience to see my country as green as it !! .
I have been an Airbnb host and also a guest, having both experiences I make all my efforts so that those who choose to stay in one of my apartments will have a nice experience enjoy their stay the fullest and also their journey in Thailand,  which has many gastronomic places and cultural events all year round.

name: Walk to BTS station+Convenient+Friendly host 中文沟通
description: Very convenient ~1 minute walk to BTS Udomsuk station. 24-hours supermarket. There's a small night market located near the condo selling many fresh fruits and Thai food. Cheap and nice! Good fitness room and two sunny swimming pools available for guests. Free WiFi is also available at the condo.
neighborhood_overview:
Sukhumvit is a very nice place to live. There are not many tourists. You will know more about the local people's life here. Of course, it's very convenient to go everywhere by Sky train.
This is not an area where Bangkok tourists live, so it is less bustling to stay here.You will really get to know the life and prices of Thai locals.Next to the house is the BTS skytrain station. It is convenient to go to Emporium by air-conditioned train in 10 minutes, and 20 minutes to downtown Siam, so you can avoid the hassle of traffic.There is an air-conditioning free shuttle at the BTS station bus stop to Cental Bangna and Mega Bangna, a large shopping mall in Asia.Of course, the location of the house is vibrant and quiet, there is a fitness room and infinity swimming pool on the rooftop, and the 24-hour supermarket downstairs provides food and drink, so enjoy your slow life in Bangkok without leaving home.Thank you for your reading!

neighborhood_overview:
* Hyde 11 is located on Soi 11 Sukhumvit Road, 400 meters from BTS Nana.
* There are many restaurants, bars, sky bars, etc.

- Embassy Central, only 1 stop to BTS Phloen Chit.

- iBaby Fertility & Gen

name: Luxury Design Condo in the heart of Bangkok
description:
A luxury condo with a "loft" design in a luxury building with amenities to rival a 5-star hotel and security. The unit is nearby night life as well as restaurants with multinational cuisine.

Indulge in the curated luxury of this artistic apartment. Experience a peaceful atmosphere in a quiet space featuring elegant furnishings and decor, lush plants throughout, and access to building amenities including a gym and sauna.
host_about:
Hello my name is Jerry and I work in technology and teach yoga by the side. Grew up in US, China and Japan, I speak Mandarin, English and Japanese. Currently I am based in Singapore, also an Airbnb experience host offering yoga teachings.

I travel very frequently for work so I have decided to rent out my apartments to good travelers with a reasonable price. So far I have listings in Shanghai, Hangzhou, Bangkok, Singapore and San Francisco. Convenience is my top priority when selecting places myself thus all my Airbnb rentals are located in the heart of the city center with very easy access to any public transportations. You would also expect luxury amenities from 5 star hotels (which I collected from my business travels :). There are also coffee/tea, water, snacks inside the room. I greet all my guests in person and offer as many local tips as I can. 

A city is made up of  the people living inside, I want my guests to enjoy not just the tourist spots but also good hospitality and warm welcome from local people. Looking forward to be hosting you next!

name: Perfect Location in Asoke / best choice for Couple
description: Nestled amidst this vibrant city of Bangkok, is a truly inspiring boutique hotel  from Andorra country perched high in the Pyrenees. Solitude, and inspiration is the essence of Aspira D’Andora, The sense of arrival is all embracing, be it the funky artifacts or the vibes all communicates a sense of well-being, Each of the 23 rooms is designed a story in itself
neighborhood_overview: A truly fabulous location offering a broad range of truly hip restaurants, wine bars,Cafes , Terminal 21,   a traditional Muay Thai Camp, short stroll to Asoke BTS, Metro or Benjakiti Park to keep your jogging or whatever in form makes Aspira D’Andora the perfect choice for a truly inspiring and memorable stay in Bangkok.
host_about:
Aspira D'Andora at Sukhumvit 16 
 
Nestled amidst this vibrant city of Bangkok, is a truly inspiring boutique hotel called Aspira D’Andora.
Aspira d’ Andora, original inspiration stems from the quiet little country of Andorra perched high in the Pyrenees. Solitude, calmness and inspiration is the essence of Aspira D’Andora, a truly unique hideaway yet within easy walking distance of the main artery Sukhumvit, where one can hop on the sky train, or delve into the depths of this vibrant and often chaotic city on the MRT underground train or simply explore the kaleidoscope of modern shopping malls.
The sense of arrival is all embracing, be it the funky artifacts, the nurturing colors or lemongrass aroma, or the vibes all communicates a sense of well-being while one is escorted to the communal lounge for a refreshing Thai welcome drink and formalities. Breakfast is served at the communal lounge where all day beverages are available.
Each of the 23 accommodations is individually designed a story in itself, be it from the imported antique woods that adorn the floor, the 14’’ high quality bed that guarantees the perfect slumber, or the multi-tasking walk-in shower space plotted amidst granite texture color plus the collage of artworks that adorns the walls crowned off with a splattering of lights above the headboard to set your mood. Blazingly swift free Wi-Fi, large LCD TV, refrigerator, complimentary tea/coffee plus multiple ports to re-charge your devices are all just a touch away.
A truly fabulous location offering a broad range of truly international restaurants, lounges, wine bars, coffee shops, noted points include Terminal 21, Emquartier and Emporium shopping malls, a traditional Muay Thai training centre, short stroll to Asoke BTS or Benjakiti Park to keep your jogging or whatever in form makes Aspira D’Andora the perfect choice for a truly inspiring and memorable stay in Bangkok.
neighbourhood: Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand

name: Handcrafted comfort in a lavish tranquil space
description: Indulge in our Junior Suite, a corner sanctuary in the heart of Bangkok. Featuring a handcrafted Chiang Mai queen bed, this lavish space blends Thai artistry with European elegance. Enjoy a luxurious bathroom with rain shower, Venetian mirrors, and bespoke floors. Expansive dual-aspect windows or private balconies offer stunning city views, creating your perfect urban retreat. Discover more options in our room selection for your ideal stay.
neighborhood_overview: Located in a calm residential compound, Maneeya Park Residence is the perfect place to enjoy a beautiful and relaxing stay away from the busy city district. We are located just a short troll away from the BTS - sky-train line - that will give you access to the all city life and main tourist attractions.
host_about:
Welcome to the enchanting Bangkok or KrungThep – as it is called in Thai, home to pristine natural beauty, eternal sunshine, dramatic mountains, breathtaking sparkling blue sea, exotic underwater treasures, and world famous hot and spicy cuisines.
My Homeliday Bangkok welcomes you with the comforts of a home away from home, at a cost effective alternative to a hotel stay, for your short to long stay needs.
We are a Thai-European managed company offering you brand-new fully furnished apartments, hosted in complexs serenely located just a troll away from the busy major shopping malls and Suvarnabhumi Airport, easily accessible by all kinds of public transport.
My Homeliday Bangkok is your perfect accommodation for your dream holidays in the city of Bangkok.

โรงแรม "Scene  bangkok noi" ตั้งอยู่บนถนนอรุณอัมรินทร์ เป็นถนนสายที่เก่าแก่ของธนบุรี เขตบางกอกน้อยเดิมมีชื่อเรียกว่า อำเภออมรินทร์ จากนั้นในปี พ.ศ.2459 รัชกาลที่ 6 โปรดเกล้าฯ ให้เปลี่ยนชื่ออำเภออัมรินทร์เป็น อำเภอบางกอกน้อย.
บางกอกน้อย ชุมชนชาวสวน มีสถานที่สำคัญซึ่งเกี่ยวพันกับภูมิหลังทางประวัติศาสตร์ของชุมชน อาทิ สถานีรถไฟบางกอกน้อย โรงพยาบาลศิริราช กรมอู่ทหารเรือ ฯลฯ จึงเป็นที่มาของชื่อ Scene Bangkok Noi นี้เอง.

incredible pool villa is located in the most high-society districts of Bangkok, surrounded by billionaires houses and top successful business executive's family of Thailand, infinity swimming pool with Jacuzzi system, large master bedroom dressed with the finest linens and guests can enjoy the perfect romantic evening on the outdoor balcony or on a sofa bed while relaxing like on paradise.

Whatever amount of people. This room can host for whole family

if you like to feel and sense the local, this place is just for you.

I designed the room to be like you are in a wood cabin. It gave you more comfy more privacy and definitely more cozy than any others hostel out there in downtown.
neighborhood_overview: It's close to Mrt Phra ram 9 station which located under the Big mall called Central department store. You can find everything , shopping food and cinema
host_about:
Hi My Dear travel friends,

I was born and live in Bangkok.

I'm a business owner and I love to travel around the world once or twice a year like you guys do - I guess ^^ 

I  love bicycle , swimming, joking, going to gym and reading.

I dream to have my own boutique hotel here in Bangkok, but why do that? because of Airbnb. I think I don't need it anymore. lol 

When I travel to New York or anywhere in the world. I like to use Airbnb
I think it explore the new world of travel experience. You will feel and touch
the local rather than staying at the hotel and of course, cheaper ! 55

This is the best way to learn and feel of that country and people. And it will make you have more experience and best of all the good memory that you can't find if you staying hotel or come with the group tour package. 

Ok, too long story I think.  Wrap it up. I'm here because I'm the one who're the same as you guys. Travelling, eating, sleeping, slow life...etc.

So I find several places that perfect for you guys to stay and easy to access by any mean of transports.  

Believe me , you have to stay with the one that feel like you, not the one that do it for business purpose only. 

I know what you want and love. That's all !!

See ya Soon.

name: Homey Airport Condo near Mall 24hrs Check-In
description: Near Donmuang airport just 10 min drive
host_about:
Welcome to airbnb world :) I am a Thai native . Born and raised in BKK.
I have always loved to travel, my first time on a plane was when a had just turned seven and ever since I fell in love with the world, I describe my self as a "citizen of the world" and as such we should not miss the opportunity to explore as many places as we can, but always keeping in mind this : " The most important thing when traveling is not the destination but our attitude and openness to live new experiences and perceive and respect all different cultures and beliefs ". We live in a world full of diversity and should respect it as is!! 
I love trekking and mountaineering, so I have had the experience to see my country as green as it !! .
I have been an Airbnb host and also a guest, having both experiences I make all my efforts so that those who choose to stay in one of my apartments will have a nice experience enjoy their stay the fullest and also their journey in Thailand,  which has many gastronomic places and cultural events all year round.

name: Month 10% off, swim pool, gym, wifi,rama9,RCA,JODD
description:
This is a private highest-level community in the area, equipped with brand-new furniture and bedding that is not shared with others! Waiting for your vacation.

It's a 10-minute drive from Rama9 subway station, JODD FAIRS, and RCA CLUBS. with a 50-meter infinity pool, gym, sauna, high-altitude scenic leisure bar, children's game room, outdoor game area, and reading room.

Piyavate、Bangkok 、Praram 9 Hospital are all about a 10-minute drive away, making it convenient for you to go at any time.
neighborhood_overview: The JODD FAIRS Night Market, Rama 9 Shopping Center, Fortune Town Shopping Center, RCA nightclub district, and Bangkok Music City are all within a 10-minute taxi ride away. You can enjoy the convenience of hanging out with friends and having a drink at night without being disturbed by loud music. The RAMA9 subway station, which is close to Bangkok's new CBD, is about 2 kilometers away if you walk straight out the door. You can take a unique Bangkok-style GRAB motorcycle and be connected to the convenient MRT or BTS rail transit in just 5 minutes.

The RAMA9 subway station, which is close to Bangkok's new CBD, is about 2 kilometers away if you walk straight out the door. You can take a unique Bangkok-style GRAB motorcycle and be connected to the convenient MRT or BTS rail transit in just 5 minutes.

name: Cozy Getaway Home | Near Chatuchak&DMK (1BR)
description:
The Cozy Getaway Home is a fully furnished home (which sleeps up to 4) in a nice and quiet neighbourhood away from all city buzz.

Pros:
-Fully equipped space with WiFi
-Spacious living space
-1 Queen, Single Extra Bed, Couch
-Peaceful and quiet neighborhood
-Public pool and gym

Cons:
-Not in walking distance to BTS/MRT station
-Normally it'd only take 10-15 mins to get to the nearest MRT/BTS. But during rush hour it could take up to 30 minutes.
neighborhood_overview:
Nice and quiet neighborhood with 24/7 security to hide from all city buzz. Yet it's only a short ride to the nearest BTS/MRT station. From there, you can get connected to all the main attractions Bangkok has to offer.

There are a few nice restaurants in walking distance or a short taxi ride (Ask for further info!). Communal pool and gym offered!
host_about:
Sawaddee Ka(Hello)!

Thank you for choosing my family-owned home.  Born in Thailand and grew up in the U.S., I have returned to Thailand permanently and now living in the outskirt of Bangkok. 

If I can't greet you upon your arrival or during your stay, I am online with you mostly all the time. Please make yourself at home, and don't hesitate to reach out because I am here to make your stay as smooth as I can :-)
neighbourhood: Chatuchak, Bangkok, Thailand

Peaceful neighborhood

description:

neighborhood_overview: Chaengwattana road is known as the Government or IT road. There are many important places around this area. one of the best one is Impact Muengthong which is one of the biggest exhibition fair which is pretty close to the condo. also have so many department stores, supermarket, restaurants around.
host_about:
Sawasdee ka, my name is Nueng. I am from Bangkok but now I live in Koh Phangan, the south of Thailand. My life is between the city and the beach and I love both! 

I work as a jewellery wholesaler and exporter. I'm into yoga, holistic living, traveling. I have an indian vegetarian restaurant in koh phangan. You are welcome to visit and eat the traditional indian food. 

Now i am a mom of my new born baby boy. Please forgive me if i am not welcoming you myself as now i spend most of my time with the little one :) but i have my lovely staff taking care the place instead of me. She is super helpful and will help you in any problem you have and make sure your stay in koh samui is a most pleasant in any possible way. And i am always very active on message, just text me if you need anything and i will make sure to get back to you soonest as i can. 

I own 4 properties in Bangkok and Koh Samui, which initially had them for my  family vacation. But I'm happy to open them for rent to whoever interest and able to take care of the room same as their own home. Feel free to ask me any questions about the rental or Thailand. I'm more than happy to share what I know. :-)
Kob Kun Ka
Nueng
neighbourhood: Tambon Khlong Klua, Chang Wat Nonthaburi, Thailand

description: The Siam Champs Elyseesi Unique Hotel is a Unique Hotel located in the heart of Bangkok City Old Town or “Rattanakosin Island”. host_about:
Hi My Dear travel friends,

I was born and live in Bangkok.

I'm a business owner and I love to travel around the world once or twice a year like you guys do - I guess ^^ 

I  love bicycle , swimming, joking, going to gym and reading.

I dream to have my own boutique hotel here in Bangkok, but why do that? because of Airbnb. I think I don't need it anymore. lol 

When I travel to New York or anywhere in the world. I like to use Airbnb
I think it explore the new world of travel experience. You will feel and touch
the local rather than staying at the hotel and of course, cheaper ! 55

This is the best way to learn and feel of that country and people. And it will make you have more experience and best of all the good memory that you can't find if you staying hotel or come with the group tour package. 

Ok, too long story I think.  Wrap it up. I'm here because I'm the one who're the same as you guys. Travelling, eating, sleeping, slow life...etc.

So I find several places that perfect for you guys to stay and easy to access by any mean of transports.  

Believe me , you have to stay with the one that feel like you, not the one that do it for business purpose only. 

I know what you want and love. That's all !!

See ya Soon.

name: Airport Studio 1 / Train  / Can Cook / 7-11 .
description: If you have a car and need to parking for free in condo area let me know before book due to i need to give a ticket for you by myself
host_about:
Welcome to airbnb world :) I am a Thai native . Born and raised in BKK.
I have always loved to travel, my first time on a plane was when a had just turned seven and ever since I fell in love with the world, I describe my self as a "citizen of the world" and as such we should not miss the opportunity to explore as many places as we can, but always keeping in mind this : " The most important thing when traveling is not the destination but our attitude and openness to live new experiences and perceive and respect all different cultures and beliefs ". We live in a world full of diversity and should respect it as is!! 
I love trekking and mountaineering, so I have had the experience to see my country as green as it !! .
I have been an Airbnb host and also a guest, having both experiences I make all my efforts so that those who choose to stay in one of my apartments will have a nice experience enjoy their stay the fullest and also their journey in Thailand,  which has many gastronomic places and cultural events all year round.

name: Lovely 3 bedroom unit in the center of Bangkok
description:
Our 200 SQM appartement in the city center of Bangkok, Sukhumvit area is a perfect place for a group of friends or family in holiday.

BTS Phrom Pong is 15 min walk, all cafes, groceries stores, bars and kids friendly cafes are nearby.

3 bedrooms with 2 double bed and 1 kids room with a single bed. We can add a small extra mattress if needed.

We live here and our place is filled with love and everything you need !

If you want to stay with a Thai family, learning a bit of Thai language or any tips about traveling in Thailand then this place is definitely for you! Our area is located in Bangkunnon area.
Do you want to stay in a more local area but get that comfort like you are home?
Are you bored to just go to the place that everyone goes?
My mom is going to cook for you in the morning or you can request, when you want to have your food.
There's no reason that you will not choose our place. :P

name: Flat in Bangkok, Sathon
description: The flat is located on the 19th Floor of a very modern building equipped with gym, sauna, swimming pool (on the 6th floor) and a private parking lot space - guests can take any parking spot on the 3-5 floors. Guests can benefit from a spectacular view from the flat balcony which oversees the financial buildings. Safety and a clean place is top of our priority with a reception open 830am-530pm and 24/7 security. The building also has clothes washing machine and a tumble dryer on the ground floor.
neighborhood_overview:
Located right at the heart of Bangkok, Supalai Oriental Place connects the busy Bangkok Financial district and the vibrant commercial district of Khlong Sathorn.
Off-License shops: It offers multiple 7/11 shops (which are all 24/7) right by the entrance of the property and alongside the main road. Food trucks are well in abundance with cheap options available. Transport: The BTS overground train stations are all well within a 5-min tuk-tuk or a moto-taxi rides; walk it in 15min to the nearest Sala Daeng BTS train station with shopping malls and cinema in the Si Lom district. Buses and uber-like apps such as: Grab will make your transport much easier. Airport: Don Mueang airport is within 30min car drive. You can also take the BTS train to the property. Nightlife: Bangkok night life is vibrant with multiple bars by the main road and nightclubs around the commercial road. Safety: it is a busy neighbourhood with shops of high-value (gold shops around) and banks which provides a gre

name: Tranquil 1BR Hideaway: Resort-style riverside pool
description: Kick back and relax from the Bangkok hustle and bustle in this calm resort-style condo. Fresh green trees all-around and all the amenities and conveniences at your doorstep.
host_about:
Hi there! I'm a Canadian expat who has been living and working in Thailand for the past 7 years. I love the culture and the people here, and I'm always happy to share my insider knowledge of the local areas with my guests. 

When I'm not hosting, you can find me exploring the local cafes or trying out new Thai restaurants. I'm excited to share my home and my love of Thailand with you during your stay.

name: week 5% off, swim pool, gym, wifi,rama9,RCA,JODD
description:
This is a private highest-level community in the area, equipped with brand-new furniture and bedding that is not shared with others! Waiting for your vacation.

It's a 10-minute drive from Rama9 subway station, JODD FAIRS, and RCA CLUBS. with a 50-meter infinity pool, gym, sauna, high-altitude scenic leisure bar, children's game room, outdoor game area, and reading room.

Piyavate、Bangkok 、Praram 9 Hospital are all about a 10-minute drive away, making it convenient for you to go at any time.
neighborhood_overview: The JODD FAIRS Night Market, Rama 9 Shopping Center, Fortune Town Shopping Center, RCA nightclub district, and Bangkok Music City are all within a 10-minute taxi ride away. You can enjoy the convenience of hanging out with friends and having a drink at night without being disturbed by loud music. The RAMA9 subway station, which is close to Bangkok's new CBD, is about 2 kilometers away if you walk straight out the door. You can take a unique Bangkok-style GRAB motorcycle and be connected to the convenient MRT or BTS rail transit in just 5 minutes.

name: Spacious & cozy home w/ rooftop patio 700m to BTS
description:
A unique, modern unit located on the top 3 floors of a triplex, shared townhouse. Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space situated in a local neighborhood on the edge of the city. This place is just a 9 minute walk from the Skytrain (BTS Bangchak), which gives you super easy access to the rest of town!

I call this apartment home. Over the winter, I will be traveling and am happy to share this wonderful spot with others looking for a stay in Bangkok. Please be respectful!
neighborhood_overview:
A townhouse nestled in a local Thai neighborhood - there are not many high rises on this street. You will hear the faint sound of motorbikes and cars from the house! There are locals selling coconuts just a 50m walk from the house, and street food vendors located at either end of the main road. There are many random shops for you to check out - coffeeshops, donut shop, nails, salons, bakery, gyms, restaurants, markets, street food, and more.

7/11 - 100m
Lifter Club 24/ Chokamorn May Thai Gym - 950m
Bang Chak BTS - 700m
Jim Thompson Factory Outlet - 400m
93 Coffee Garage - 300m
Baked 93 Bakery House - 400m

description:

host_about:
Hi, I’m Anna! 
A scuba diver and outdoor sports lover based in Bangkok, with roots in Singapore. My chic, fully-equipped condos in Bangkok and Phuket offer fresh amenities, smart tech, and top-notch comfort. Need local tips or diving advice? I'm here to help! I love hosting and ensuring my guests have unforgettable stays. Whether for business or leisure, I'm dedicated to making your experience amazing. 
See you soon!
Anna

Hi, I’m Anna! 
A scuba diver and outdoor sports lover based in Bangkok, with roots in Singapore. My chic, fully-equipped condos in Bangkok and Phuket offer fresh amenities, smart tech, and top-notch comfort. Need local tips or diving advice? I'm here to help! I love hosting and ensuring my guests have unforgettable stays. Whether for business or leisure, I'm dedicated to making your experience amazing. 
See you soon!
Anna

name: Experience a Peak of Luxury
description:
No stone was left unturned. The master bedroom offers pure luxury. This room is very spacious with own ensuite and private balcony overlooking the newly established neighbourhood. The room offers plenty of hanging and drawer space, so no need to live out of a suitcase.
Get a good night's rest in the comfortable king size bed.
The room also features a large flat screen LCD Television equipped with satellite channels and a powerful air conditioner to keep you cool during the hot summer nights.
neighborhood_overview:
Residence Park Baan Chuan Chuen is a Quiet and safe Neighbourhood. This gated community has 2 security check points before reaching the house. Plearnary shopping mall , The Promenade mall and fashion Island is only a short 5 minute ride by taxi . Glittering Temples and bustling back Street markets is only 20 minutes away. Bangkok airport is approximately 20-25 minutes away. Take advantage of a rich cultural heritage and exciting night life that Bangkok has to offer.

Also to consider about the Location : Main Road, Ramintra, Tha Raeng Subdistrict, Bang Khen District, Bangkok

Highlights/Nearby Places : - Nawamin 9 Hospital - Synphaet Hospital - Sri Siam Hospital - Nopparat Rajathanee Hospital - Central General Hospital - Kasetsart University - Phranakhon Rajabhat University - Sripatum University - Sai Aksorn School - Wat Phra Si Mahathat Demonstration Secondary School - Watcharaphon Fresh Market - Central Ramintra - Lotus - Fashion Island - Safari World - Siam Park
host_about: Hi, my name is Dale! I was born and raised in beautiful Sydney, Australia. I work in the travel industry, so I spend most of my time meeting new and exciting people, visiting some of the most extraordinary places and  learning new things. Some of my favourite destinations are Bangkok, New York and Barcelona. When I’m not travelling, I enjoy catching up with friends and family, watching a movie or just chilling out at a cafe.

name: Modern Top Floor Apartment in Central Bangkok
description:
Modernised studio apartment - 42sqm

Fully furnished, hot water shower, 2x AC, ceiling fans, 24hrs security, 10m pool with gym and car park

Unblocked city skyline views and balcoy with deck table and bar chairs

The condo is located in Sukhumvit, a great area to go out and shop in most trendy areas like "Ekkamai", "Thonglor", "Asoke" or "Phrom Pong".

Also in 10min walk you can reach W-market with food trucks and the "Rintao" ice cream shop.

Feel free to message for any other questions.

• Relaxing sky terrace.

• No smoking in the room.

neighborhood_overview:
Neighborhood Description

Travel Attractions Around Our Home:

1. Central Rama 9: A mere stone’s throw away, this is a premier shopping and entertainment hub. Dive into an array of top brands, savor gourmet dishes, or catch the latest movies here.

2. JODD FAIRS: Situated close to Our Home, JODD FAIRS is an iconic venue known for hosting various events, exhibitions, and fairs, making it a must-visit for those looking to immerse themselves in local culture and happenings.

3. Fortune Town: An electronic and IT mall, it’s a haven for tech enthusiasts with its vast selection of gadgets and gizmos.

4. Rod Fai Market Ratchada: An enchanting night market close by, filled with colorful stalls, unique antiques, and tantalizing street food.

5. Makkasan Railway Park: A breath of fresh air amidst the city, this park offers a peaceful spot for relaxation or a refreshing morning jog.

6. Wat Asokaram: A tranquil temple in the v

name: Peaceful 1-bedroom with swimming pool, breakfast
description:
Our residence is located on Ratchada-Lad Phrao Road in Bangkok, Thailand. It is ideal for guests seeking a quiet place to stay in Bangkok for whatever reason. Greetings from our extended family!

Our home has a modern style, followed by a minimalist interior design. On the first floor, there is a shared living area open to the kitchen room, which has high ceilings. Both areas are accessible throughout the swimming pool and connect to the backyard.
neighborhood_overview:
The accommodation area is set back from the Ratchada-Lad Phrao Road. Enter the alley for approximately 1 km. The lodging area is peaceful. The majority of neighbors in the same area are residential houses with no source of deterioration or garbage dump.

Ratchada-Ladprod Road is a new HUB that combines various amenities and is reputed to be another important residential area in Bangkok. If you want to go to Chatuchak Weekend Market or Central Ladprod, it is easy and does not take a long time to travel by sky train (BTS) or MRT underground train (MRT) or even call a local taxi.

name: Family Room with shared Bathroom
description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place.Its near to Phaya Thai BTS.Its near to MBK Center and Siam Paragon Shoping center.Many restaurants are near this place.
host_about:
Welcome to Siam Journey Guesthouse! We are a small, community-orientated guesthouse based in an authentic Thai neighborhood near the heart of Bangkok. At the guesthouse are two 12-bed dormitories, as well as two 4-bed dormitories, for those of you looking for a communal atmosphere.  All our dorms come equipped with A/C, as well as clean linens, secured lockers, fresh towels and WiFi.  On the main floor you will find our large lounge, where you can come and relax, share stories or a drink, and have a great time with us and the other guests. 

Located in central Bangkok, our guesthouse is just a five minute walk from the Airport Rail Link and Phaya Thai BTS Skytrain stations. We are within walking distance to Siam Square, Victory Monument, neighborhood pubs and restaurants. Nearby is our local street market where you can find fresh fruit, food stall eats and the best roti in town. You will find whatever you need just steps away.

We coordinate weekly activities in and around Bangkok for the guests of Siam Journey to have a greater experience of our city. Looking for a great meal? Come with us as we explore Chinatown, Sukhumvit and Sao Ching Cha for the unique and unforgettable.  Want to spend the day shopping? Throughout the city are numerous markets, from the all-day weekend markets to the underground night markets. As well, there are muay thai fights, river boat rides, and glamorous rooftop lounges. Bangkok has it all, so let us show you what this great city has to offer. 

We are experienced hosts and travelers who can provide helpful advice, suggestions and directions throughout your stay with us, as well as help with various tour details should you choose to travel outside of Bangkok and onward to Thailand’s other provinces.
Come and join us as we journey through amazing and wondrous Siam! Sawat dee Krup!

name: Khaosan Hotel @Khaosan @Bangkok Thailand
description:
1 Large Double bed (Excluding breakfast)

Conveniently located on the lively Khaosan Road, offers stylish rooms with a flat-screen TV. It features a rooftop swimming pool, restaurant and a 24-hour front desk. City centre can be reached by Hua Lamphong MRT Train Station, only a 20-minute drive from the property.

On the rooftop terrace, guests can relax with massage, enjoy sweeping views of the city. The hotel provides concierge and currency exchange services. Travel bookings can be made at desk
neighborhood_overview:
10-minute walk from the Grand Palace and Bangkok National Museum, while China Town is a 20-minute drive away. Shopping centres like MBK and Siam Paragon is within a 30-minute drive from the hotel.

Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 8.2 for a two-person trip.

description:

neighborhood_overview:
Strategically situated in the heart of the city, Narastay @ Phrom Phong offers unrivaled convenience with the BTS Phrom Phong station a quick 8-minute walk away, granting you access to all of Bangkok’s attractions.

Shop till you drop at Emquartier Mall (820m) and Emporium Mall (880m), while Novotel Suites Mall (170m) caters to your everyday essentials. Stay active at The Racquet Club (480m) or unwind at the Herbal Ground Spa (0m) and Gaaya by Oasisspa (70m).

Delight your taste buds with a plethora of dining options just steps away, including The Iron Fairies, Dis Tinto Spanish Wine Bar, and Opera Italian Restaurant, as well as numerous cafes like Shirokumaya Café and Torajiro Izakaya.

For your daily necessities, Seven Eleven (20m) is at hand, with UFM Fuji Super (340m) and Tops Fine Foods (360m) providing premium grocery options. Keep fit at Jetts 24 Hr Fitness Centre (170m) or YS Kick Sport Gym (200m).

Narastay @ Phrom Phong promises a dynam
host_about:
Hello and welcome to Narastay! We're thrilled to host you at our co-living apartments nestled in the heart of Bangkok.

At Narastay, we're dedicated to creating a dynamic ecosystem for travelers, digital nomads, and both short-term and long-term guests. Our vibrant community is the perfect place to connect, collaborate, and thrive, all while enjoying our cozy accommodations!
neighbourhood: Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand

name: WFH in BKK : High fl, Fib Wifi, BTS, Rooftop Pool
description: Our place is a perfect base for you and your family to explore Bangkok. Centrally located, about 8-10 minutes walk to the nearest sky train (BTS), and a few minutes to a bus stop. It is a unique place that provides you with the best of both worlds; authentic and touristic. Boosting convenient connection but also a peaceful atmosphere to help you refresh, relax and revive in this bustling city. You will enjoy a beautiful city view from our room, a comfortable space, and a wonderful rooftop pool.
neighborhood_overview:
This is a unique neighbourhood that combines the experience of living in an area surrounding the authentic Thai community yet conveniently connected to the whole city through the sky train and public transportation. This allows you to make the most of your time as a tourist while living among local like you're at home.

The building benefits from its location on the prime area, yet quietly nestled in a small alley. You will enjoy all the amenities and activities around the area, including varying food options, tourist attractions, shopping malls, temples, and other interesting things to do and see. We'll provide recommendations and tips that will surely make your stay even more memorable :).
host_about:
In a nutshell, we are a young couple with two lovely kids. We love to travel and a big fan of tasty and healthy food :-). We enjoy varying sports and hobbies, to name a few: scuba diving, surfing, hiking, cycling, swimming, snorkeling, Ham radio, mindfulness meditation etc.

We are flexible and friendly, always ready to explore and connect with people, different cultures, and nature.

name: Entire flat near ARL, MRT & BTS
description:
Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place.

This place located in the popular Ratchathewi district near BTS Nana, near MRT Phetchaburi and near ARL Makkasan.

Building features:
44 SQM.
Gym
Relaxing swimming pool
Steam and Sauna room
Beautiful garden area on premise
Kids play area
Security cameras
24-hours security
A convenience store; 7-11 at the ground floor
Parking space available
host_about:
I'm a student who really love to travel. Recently I've been focussing on  my research and study.  I am Thai so being polite and considerate to others is typical. I am the quiet guest, but I also enjoy a chat, debate and discussion about almost anything. I also love to cook (but not expert) - favourite speciality is definitely Thai food. 

I am very new as a host on Airbnb. I am welcoming and helpful and expect you to enjoy the property as a home, though I do ask you leave it tidy and clean on departure. If you have questions, then do ask me, rather than suffer in silence.

I have been in Nottingham for 2 years and know the city quite well, so if you have questions about where to visit I'm willing to share suggestions.

Thank you.
