name: Modern condo | 1BR Full Facility
description:
Welcome to our modern room in the heart of vibrant BKK!

Our 1 bed room condo has everything you need for your comfortable stay :
→ Roof top pool
→ Gym, Sauna, Steam room
→ Queen Bed
→ Working Desk
→ High Speed wifi, TVs, air con
→ Washing machine
→ Co-Working space

Just 500m to BTS Phrakanong and 7 min walk to "W-District". Easy connect to the city center.

☆"Our home is very clean and quiet. Perfect for working remotely or just staying in the city close to park, malls and lots of activity"
neighborhood_overview:
The condo is located in a little side street next to the main road with many little restaurants and cafes aswell as a 7-11 convenience store, right infront of the building.

Right around the corner is the BTS station Phra Khanong which will bring you into the city or areas like Thonglo within some minutes.
The vibrant "W-District" with outdoor restaurants and people gathering is as close as 7 minutes away by walk.
host_about: I live in Bangkok mostly. I am in love with the nature, culture, dogs and oat milk :) I like travelling and sharing experiences. I have been working in service industry for over 10 years and it allows me chances to travel, meet & share stories with great people and be experienced in this lovely airbnb community. I will pass it on to my lovely guests when I welcome you to my homes.

name: 1 bedroom condo, 28 floor
description:
Cosy, spacious 1 bedroom condo with mesmerising view over Bangkok from 28 floor. Centrally located between BTS Chid Lom & BTS Ratchadamree - 5 min walk. Easy access to everything from this central location.

The place is available starting 8 May '24 for stays of 1/2/ 3 months only. I sublet the place while I am away. Stays less than 30 days are not allowed.

Landlord will be notified of your stay, collect your data and provide face ID to enter the building and swimming pool area.

Send me PM
host_about:
Hi and thank you for visiting my little gem in the heart of Bangkok.
I am in and out of Thailand as I work within the region so decided to rent out my place.

name: A shop house-Bangpho Station
description:
This area isn't busy as others area. Loads of decent local food at regular price.
We're in the middle between Bangpho MRT Station and Taopoon station. It is only 500m from both stations. Here also has a connection to the Chao Phraya Express Boat at Bang Pho Pier (600m) to Iconsiam, The Grand Palace, Wat Arun or anywhere in central BKK. There is a bus stop right in front of the house. let's hop on the bus to Kaosan Rd-6km away. There are many choices you can choose to roam in BKK!
host_about:
I'm a student who really love to travel. Recently I've been focussing on  my research and study.  I am Thai so being polite and considerate to others is typical. I am the quiet guest, but I also enjoy a chat, debate and discussion about almost anything. I also love to cook (but not expert) - favourite speciality is definitely Thai food. 

I am very new as a host on Airbnb. I am welcoming and helpful and expect you to enjoy the property as a home, though I do ask you leave it tidy and clean on departure. If you have questions, then do ask me, rather than suffer in silence.

I have been in Nottingham for 2 years and know the city quite well, so if you have questions about where to visit I'm willing to share suggestions.

Thank you.

Hi! My name is Matty, addicted traveling and any Jazz tracks  from Chet Baker . A designer , a 4years old boy's father , a husband and a  world traveller . we would show you what is real side of the city, not just ximending , or all those touristy spots   ! our apts is located in Da An District, Taipei City, and near by boutique, cafe, restaurant, bars and night clubs , also all well-known local attractions. 
 
we are developing many apartments into short stay apartments in the Don Chu 東區 area.  If you are visiting or staying in Taipei, it is a great spot to spend time with your friends , family and explore this city or out and about.

We hope to meet you  and showing you around 

Matty
